creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Three paneled huipil with red and white vertical stripes, and multicolored geometric embroidery; embroidered designs located at chest, shoulder, and back; sleeves consist of slits cut at sides; neck opening is square and surrounded by purple, green, and yellow silk embroidery
title: Huipil
